text: Captain I see a large object heading on
towards us fit in the water you seen
what we're seeing from the bow captain
dead I got a visual on another Megalodon
Finn get ready Marines big guns are down
so it's on us improvise adapt and
crbs I don't want to have a reason to
panic unless we need one hi sir loud and
clear crew do not fired till I give the
order I don't want us was an ammo copy
that Ur eyes up Marines all hands
